channel.title: Contradiction
channel.description:
3.You do not currently play runescape, or any other Jagex game, and are therefore not subject to their TOS or any other agreement with them.
Wouldn't that mean most people here should be removed from the community or the TOS needs to be changed.

item.title: Contradiction
item.dc:creator: @kingman002 kingman002
item.description:
@kingman002 wrote:

I never read the TOS. Only like a few words of it when I am waiting for the page to load after I click accept.

Read full topic

item.title: Contradiction
item.dc:creator: @Daginith Daginith
item.description:
@Daginith wrote:

[quote=“Classic_, post:11, topic:440830”][quote author=Daginith link=topic=543504.msg3983756#msg3983756 date=1335630034]

No, technically it doesn’t

As it’s been explained, talking about RuneScape does not strictly mean you play the game. Nor does owning an account on the game, or showing pictures of you playing, as you may have quit since the time of that picture. Sure, maybe we could ASSUME people play Runescape if they post in the section, but we can’t be sure, can we?

I’m sure Jagex has plenty of ways of matching an account to a picture then finding its last log in, but how much trouble they go through to pursue it is up to them

But if nobody from Jagex is allowed on the forum how would they be able to get the picture in the first place?
[/quote]Because a TOS is not legally binding? It is essentially a pointless step in visiting the website in the first place.

Although you have to admit it DOES in fact keep some of the more rather ‘believing’ people out of here, correct?
the last thing we need is more 9 year olds on this site. >_>

Do you think fucking nine year olds read that shit[/quote]
Very. Very. Very good point…

Read full topic

I’m sure Jagex has plenty of ways of matching an account to a picture then finding its last log in, but how much trouble they go through to pursue it is up to them

But if nobody from Jagex is allowed on the forum how would they be able to get the picture in the first place?

Although you have to admit it DOES in fact keep some of the more rather ‘believing’ people out of here, correct?
the last thing we need is more 9 year olds on this site. >_>[/quote]
